oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "The Notable -- And Dramatic -- Progress of Blacks"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; African Americans; integration;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Memphis Press-Scimitar article describing the progress made by African Americans, especially in education.
